rows.label: qev092102_MSG0001
rows.name: This... It's Mika's Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092102_MSG0002
rows.name: Poor thing. Look at this damage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092102_MSG0003
rows.name: MIKA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092102_MSG0004
rows.name: No. No![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092102_MSG0005
rows.name: This can't be![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092102_MSG0006
rows.name: She never told Camber how she felt![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092102_MSG0007
rows.name: No...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092102_JNK0010
rows.name: Comfort

rows.label: qev092102_SEL0011
rows.name: Remind Alexa what a good friend Mika was.

rows.label: qev092102_JNK0020
rows.name: Watch

rows.label: qev092102_SEL0021
rows.name: Let Alexa be alone with her grief.

rows.label: qev092102_MSG0008
rows.name: Yeah, she was. She was great.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092102_MSG0009
rows.name: She was also grumpy and snarky and kind of crazy jealous...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092102_MSG0010
rows.name: But she respected me, like I did her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092102_MSG0011
rows.name: And we'd finally become friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092102_MSG0012
rows.name: Mika...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092102_MSG0013
rows.name: Good-bye, my friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092102_MSG0014
rows.name:
I... I can't just stand here crying.
Mika would be furious.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092102_MSG0015
rows.name: We need to have a look around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092102_MSG0016
rows.name: Judging from the debris, this accounts for two of the Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092102_JNK0030
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: qev092102_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Alexa she has a good eye.

rows.label: qev092102_JNK0040
rows.name: Apologize

rows.label: qev092102_SEL0041
rows.name:
Say that you're sorry Alexa had
to see the Skells like this.

rows.label: qev092102_MSG0017
rows.name: Yeah, I'm kind of a nut about this stuff. But you know that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092102_MSG0018
rows.name: It's okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092102_MSG0019
rows.name: If it means I can help, then it's for the best.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092102_MSG0020
rows.name: These are Mika and Fernand's Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092102_MSG0021
rows.name: That means the other two members of the team may be okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092102_MSG0022
rows.name: We need to hurry. I can't let things end like this.[ST:wait ]
